description: This table includes Identity ID information for the Episode (HSB) master file.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The ID of the Summary Block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the related response item.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE
columns.description: This item stores the MPI ID Type of the ID found in the MPI_ID column.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_ID
columns.description: The MPI ID associated with the MPI ID type found in the MPI_ID_TYPE column of this summary block record.

columns.name: MPI_FROM_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the first date on which the Identity ID became effective.

columns.name: MPI_TO_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date on which the Identity ID will no longer be effective.

columns.name: MPI_RET_CHK_PP_ID
columns.description: This column contains the ID of the retrieval check programming point.

columns.name: MPI_RET_CHK_RULE_ID
columns.description: This column contains the retrieval check rule.
